thread.title: CERTIS CISCO KILLED BY DRUNK DRIVER AT TUAS CHECKPOINT
thread.title_full: CERTIS CISCO KILLED BY DRUNK DRIVER AT TUAS CHECKPOINT

author: farhan
title: CERTIS CISCO KILLED BY DRUNK DRIVER AT TUAS CHECKPOINT
text:
CERTIS CISCO KILLED BY DRUNK DRIVER AT TUAS CHECKPOINT   10:23pm Advertisement 
A netizen has just sent news about a serious accident that took place between a drunk motorist and a Certis Cisco auxilliary police officer on duty at Tuas Checkpoint. 
The image captured by the netizen shows the unconscious and heavily bleeding officer lying on the ground. 
The drunk driver has been apprehended, but there is no official news about the condition of the Certis Cisco officer. 
Family members of the officer say that the officer has died of his injuries. Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
